heading: Set a new Password
text: Create a new password. Ensure it differs from previous ones for security

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters long
password.max: Password must be at most 20 characters long
password.pattern: Password must contain at least one letter and one number

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: Unable to set new password. Please try again

success.title: Password set successfully
success.description: You can now login with your new password
